name: acmwebutil
description: This small API powers member and due management for UA student organizations

FROM_EMAIL.description: The from email address for emails to members (must have a registered account with listserv.ua.edu. E.g., 'UA ACM')

FROM_ALIAS.description: The email alias (name) that displays in the headers of emails to members. E.g, 'uaacmweb@gmailc.om'

SENDGRID_API_KEY.description: The API key provided by Sendgrid for sending mass emails

ORG_NAME.description: The name of the organization to display in email communications. E.g., 'UA ACM'

CURRENT_SEMESTER_NAME.description: The name to display on receipts for dues for the current semester. E.g., 'Fall 2018'

LISTSERV_LIST_NAME.description: The name of the Listserv mailing list. E.g., 'ua-acm'

LISTSERV_PASSWORD.description: The password associated with the FROM_EMAIL for Listserv

OFFICERS_EMAIL.description: The contact email to be shown in error messages, and in email communications. E.g., 'acm-off@listserv.ua.edu'

ORG_ADDRESS.description: The address to display at the bottom of receipts. E.g., 'UA Association for Computing Machinery, Tuscaloosa, AL 35487'

EMAIL_SIGNATURE.description: The line to use at the end of email communications. E.g., 'The UA ACM Exec Board'

SLACK_INVITE_LINK.description: The Slack link to use in the invitation email. E.g., 'https://join.slack.com/...'

SLACK_TEAM_NAME.description: The name of the Slack team, E.g., '(Unofficial) UA CS'

TZ.description: The timezone to use for dates displayed in emails. Recommended: 'America/Chicago'

SECRET_KEY.description: The authorization key used for protected API calls (preferable use a randomly generated, long key)
